snippet: David Renz, who is accused of committing both crimes during a carjacking, appeared in court and said his nose had been broken in the Onondaga County Justice Center.
abstract: Syracuse, NY, authorities say David Renz, who is accused of killing woman and raping her 10-year-old daughter during a carjacking, was beaten and his nose was broken by other inmates on his first day in jail.
lead_paragraph: David Renz, who is accused of committing both crimes during a carjacking, appeared in court and said his nose had been broken in the Onondaga County Justice Center.

headline.seo: Man Accused of Rape of Girl and Murder of Her Mother Reports Jail Beating
headline.main: Man Accused of Rape and Murder in Syracuse Is Beaten in Jail
headline.print_headline: Held in Rape And Murder, Man Beaten
